website_summaries.verdict: The best shoe horn on the market right now. Its durability is worth the extra few dollars.
pros: Extra-heavy stainless steel won't bend or break
18-inch handle and smooth finish for ease of use
cons: this is likely due to stainless steel construction

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was recently cruising aboard the MS Grace along the Rhine - and everything was top notch - including the shoehorn hanging in one of the closets. I took note of its name - and ordered one from Amazon. You would think that something as simple as a shoehorn should be easy to make to function well. Most of what I tried before had shortcomings IMO. This one has none. For me its just the right length, weight, stiffness and shape.
customer_reviews.author: fredC

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Although the seller was satisfactory, the product is not. Historically my metal shoehorns have been quite thin and easy to slip in the heel space -- this one is FAR too thick to readily slip in and is just barely usable.
customer_reviews.author: Salem Spitz

customer_reviews.title: finally the One
customer_reviews.text: As a self proclaimed Shoe horn destructor that was in despair to ever find one that is truly "Heavy Duty" my curiosity was awaked by the material specs and thickness of the product. I have personally been responsible for the bending and breaking of numerous shoe horns throughout the years and have always searched for one that was up to the challenge (6'5" , 275Lbs trying to squeeze into a tied shoe). This product deserves 5 starts not just for doing what it claims but really for delivering under extreme conditions. I can proclaim that my search is over and this is the one that is truly "heavy duty". Highly recommend to all that have bend a shoe horn before.
customer_reviews.author: FYI

customer_reviews.title: Long shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: As I age I have come to learn the value of a shoe horn. I thought these were an affectation, but my brother turned me on to how much easier a shoe horn is if you don't have to bend over. This one is sturdy (a consideration I was concerned about having bent some shorter horns). It's a little large for me to travel with but not impossible if you really can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: dick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a plastic shoehorn that the specialty shoe store gave him with his new shoes. He has small motor skill difficulties and putting on shoes are very difficult. The plastic shoe horn broke after a few weeks. I did research on shoe horns and saw this one on Amazon. He's been using it for approx week and LOVES it. He said the length is really helpful. In his words, "I love the new shoe horn you bought me. It's so easy to put my shoes on - I don't even have to bend over". Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: chile

customer_reviews.title: Advertised size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The item that was shipped was labeled as 18" but measured only 16". I have to have a minimum of 18" length in order to use something like this. I returned the item and ordered another 24" plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Not Available

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and strong and there is no way this is going to bend when being used as a shoe horn. I am tall, but this is a good height for me because I put on my shoes while sitting down. If you are tall, put on your shoes when you are standing and have trouble bending down, you might wantr to consider the longer version. This is especially godd for getting your high tops on.
customer_reviews.author: Robleroy

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking the dog out in the morning much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am very stiff in the morning and needed to not bend over first thing to let the dog out. OK. so I still have to bend a little, but with this it is much less. My shoes slide right on, and I can get right out the door. I also like that it is sturdy, and not flimsy. I do not get the feeling it will break easily. It hangs on a headless nail I have pounded right into back door frame.
customer_reviews.author: SongBird

customer_reviews.title: A high tech wonder for your feet!
customer_reviews.text: Big-A super long stainless steel shoe horn that will outlive anyone on the planet. This was a best buy for me. No more struggling to wrench your foot into your shoes each morning. You know - pinching your finger between your shoe and heel? Your feet will just glide into your shoes with this high tech wonder! No more stooping, balancing, or falling over to put on your shoes. Love it! PS - I hid it by hanging it on a nail behind my bedside table, so no one makes off with it. Plus it makes a great self defense weapon if ever needed in the middle of the night. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: El Loco Doggie

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this wasn't made in China
customer_reviews.text: When I went to review this product, I was taken to a site to review shoes. Oh well! This shoe horn verifies the old adage, that you get what you pay for. It is actually quite a bargain. In a world where we have become use to: flimsy, thinner, smaller, artificial, faux etc. This product is the real thing. It is crafted like a fine instrument. Solid steel, with a nice weight. Perfectly formed for the job it was designed for. I'm sure that this shoe horn will outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoehorn for my purpose!
customer_reviews.text: As I get older it's harder to bend over to get my boots on. With this long shoehorn it is so much easier and quicker. It's very sturdy and long enough to barely bend over to use it. Saves the inside of the back of my boots from tearing out too. Figured I would try it, and it wound up being the perfect item to make my life just a little bit better and easier each day. Very glad I went with this one. Extremely pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product to replace a long shoehorn with a plastic “spoon” at the end, which had broken after a few years. This is a very solid, commercial grade stainless steel shoehorn. I read through the detailed description, and it was the thickest and heaviest 18” shoehorn I saw. It works well, is just long enough for me, and is HIGHLY UNLIKELY it will ever bend, let alone break with normal intended human use.
customer_reviews.author: WSK

customer_reviews.title: Life is easier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband, who is 6'3", and having problems with stooping down to slip on shoes. He loves this thing. As a matter of fact, he has asked for a second one so that he has one in the bedroom, and one in the utility room/mud room. This has made getting his shoes on so much easier, and he's not putting stress on his lower back. I'm also thankful I went with the longer shoe horn, because a shorter one would not have helped.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyMJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: After bending my last two shoehorns I opted for this shoehorn based on descriptions. It's truly heavy duty stainless steel, perfect length. I doubt I'll ever bend this one. Very pleased. Interesting shipping experience though. The package arrived empty and had a gouge in the side where someone obviously removed it during shipping. Amazon refunded my purchase AND Market Street Supply shipped another one free of charge with an apology email although it was not their fault. WOW, great service from both.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, solid metal shoe horn that will probably outlast us!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, metal solid shoe horn, and will probably be my last! I was getting sick and tired of buying the long, cheap plastic ones, that would last a few months only, then break or crack. I would bet that this one will last a lifetime, literally. My only minor gripes would be that I wish the bottom of the shoe horn was a little bit wider. And for some reason, my heel glides a bit easier into my shoes with my old long plastic shoe horns, than with this metal one. Minor issues, really, but I thought i'd mention them.
customer_reviews.author: CQ DX

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: Due to some knee problems, I have trouble bending to put on my shoes. Thus, I ordered a second horn. This one is 5" shorter than the first and I assumed the shorter length would make little difference. It makes a huge difference so spend a few dollars more and get the longer size. This one is very well made as is the larger one. , ie, it is a thick metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made durable must have shoe horn.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is so durable. No more breakable plastic. You do not have to sit down to use it. Mine says 18" stainless shoe horn, but mine were 16-1/2" long. Makes a great gift. Not widely available at the stores or in shoe departments and it is something you keep forgetting about until you need it. So glad I finally got mine.
customer_reviews.author: OpenMind

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Very solid.  Doubles as a self defence weapon.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the construction of this shoe horn. I wouldn't wanna get hit by one! Definitely wont bend or break. Lots of heft to it. For the money probably one of the best things I have purchased on Amazon. May not wanna take on a trip, as it might not make it past TSA!
customer_reviews.author: flyboy

customer_reviews.title: This shoe horn  is the sturdiest  shoehorn EVER !
customer_reviews.text: This shoehorn is also a piece of art. I have never seen a more sturdy and interactive shoe horn.. We have a long shoehorn at the back door when we come in from the yard one in the workshop where we come in from the car, one at the front door for guests and one in our RV, but this one is in a class of its own. We are 81 yrs old and need all the help we can get lol. This one is the very best money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Ebsworth

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose Shoe Installation Tool
customer_reviews.text: I actually laughed upon opening this. This "shoe horn" is quite substantial, thick stainless steel. Unlike the cheap plastic one that broke, I can't ever imagine damaging this. In fact, I could see this being used as a defensive tool. Or back-scratcher as another reviewer pointed out (I have confirmed it does work in this manner). If you need a quality shoe-horn, look no further. This is that and so much more...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend you use the horn until your foot is in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a large solid shoe horn. It's quite long, and it is inflexible. Some people noted that because of its inflexibility, it hurts their feet when they use it. I would recommend you use the horn until your foot is in the shoe and heel is starting to slide in. Then pull the horn out. You should be able to continue sliding your foot into the shoe at this point with no further effort nor any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: modean987

customer_reviews.title: Well made, smooth, good weight to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, with adequate weight to it. The shoe horn is a good size and length. Makes it easier to slip my shoes on with out bending over. The only complaint I have is with the back end, where it had a small hole and the "hook". Neither are very helpful in hanging this item up. The hook is not deep enough to let it hang, and the position of the hole makes it unusable on a hook. I will probably attach a string to the hole, and use the string to hang it up. It is too long to fit inside my socks drawer.
customer_reviews.author: JimWorm

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he has a bad back. He loves it, the length is perfect and he uses it for his work boys and his sneakers. I use it for my cowgirl boots, so much easier getting them on now.
customer_reviews.author: TorriB

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy shoehorn!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He has tried it now on several pairs of shoes and found it really helpful. It is long enough so he doesn't have to bend way over (an issue for him) to get his shoes on. It is strong and being metal, won't break like the plastic ones. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent assistance getting on shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a hard time bending down and getting on shoes. This shoehorn has been really excellent in assisting her with this process. I like that it is all metal and slim and long - making it sturdy, very portable and perfect for helping out getting on the most stubborn shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Basile

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Wasn't expecting it to be this nice, even though I read all the reviews. I was worried it might be too long or too short (I'm 5'7"), but it's a perfect length. I was worried about it being too thin or too thick, man, this thing is SO thick, but not too thick, surprisingly. The edges aren't sharp, they're clean and smooth. This thing is a beast. So impressed with the quality. Never thought I'd rave so much about a shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: cs24601

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe horn. If anything happens to this I will buy again. Delivery was also excellent. Actually the stainless shoe horn was much better and works better than I expected. I certainly would recommend this to anyone who has arthritis or problems bending over to put shoes on. Or just because your shoe will go on better with the help this gives. I looked a long time for something like this and so happy to find something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Simple, non intrusive and useful
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't look bad hanging up, I recently purchased a big plastic one that looked cheap and stood out, but this one is very elegant and simple and looks like it could fit in anywhere. It is very handy but it's not as long as other shoe horns so if you can't bend over at all I'd recommend a different longer one, but it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: A little on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: Its great if you have trouble bending or have injured/pained fingers. My mother has arthritis in both of her hands so this helps her stay a bit more independent. It’s a little heavy so I might have to buy a lighter weight in the future but this is a sturdy and durable Shoe horn, I can see this being a good investment for a lifetime of use.
customer_reviews.author: Boba

customer_reviews.title: Clothiers are so helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought one one of these clothiers cause all my friends got one and showed so I bought one of my own. At first I thought it was a waste of money and there's no need for one when you can just use your fingers. Once I got one of these I thought again and I'm like OMG this thing it so helpfull and saves time, I'm so glad I got one and I hope whoever is reading this and take my advice on getting this it will change your way in seeing how to put on your shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The shoe horn has a good weight to it, feels sturdy. Doesn't feel like it will bend over time. It's long enough that I can use it standing up, bending over just a bit. It was worth the money so I won't be bending the backs of my shoes trying to slip them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, but not 18"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy stainless steel shoe horn. Sturdy enough that you could also use it as a defensive weapon. There are many sellers of this same shoe horn, which also comes in different sizes. Only con is the description; it is only 16" long.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a shoehorn!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a shoehorn. I won't have to worry about it breaking as soon as I put any pressure on it my heel slides right down into the shoe without breaking down the back of the shoe wonderful wonderful wonderful thank you.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe horn to keep in my truck so I can easily swap shoes when I need to do field work. This one, at about 17", is long enough to do the job and because it is very strong metal I won't have to worry about breaking it. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Great guide

customer_reviews.title: This is a joy to own
customer_reviews.text: This is a joy to own. It is sturdy, simple, and a great tool for helping me quickly slip on my shoes over my bulky foot braces instead of struggling over them. I would suggest that it would be a great gift item for many people, pregnant women, elderly, people with back problems, or those who have balance issues. This long shoe horn makes it easy to get any type of shoe with a back on it, even if it is just a strap, onto your foot without crouching all the way down to hook the shoe or strap with a finger and wrestle it over your heel.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors!
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 with a big belly so i have trouble bending to get my shoes on with my old short shoe horn. This 18" shoe horn is a great help. i can sit in a chair and use it to get m shoes on much easier without bending at th waist.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoehorn has met every expectation !! It is sturdy, all one piece, just the right length and easy to use. I previously purchased this item from another carrier that was made in two- parts. It separated, where the two parts connected, the FIRST time it was used !! If you are looking for the perfect shoehorn, this is the one !!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 75year old sister who was having trouble getting her shoes on but with this shoe horn she no longer has any trouble at all. She is very happy with it an it has made her mornings a bit easier getting dressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So, this is the 2nd shoe horn I have gotten from you folks and I have to say that they are wonderful! I ordered the 2nd one because the 1st one went 'missing' while my 70 year old brother was visiting (wink, wink). I am 57 and hate trying to pull on my boots, leaning over and struggling with their snug fit. The shoe horn makes getting my boots on a breeze. I'd highly recommend them to anyone that wears boots (or shoes that are difficult to get on)!
customer_reviews.author: Phebe Hays

customer_reviews.title: Has been so helpful in getting shoes on
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy shoehorn is well-made, just the right length, nice smooth metal, and helps me with all of my shoes - even the slip on running shoes so I don't crush down the back of them. Really happy with product - easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: What I. Like

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in both knees and need a long shoe horn to get my shoes and boots on. I have actually bent a metal shoe horn before in trying to get my boots on. This is a great and sturdy metal shoe horn with metal that is thicker than any other I have owned. I bought two (one for upstairs and one for downstairs) and am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: AdirondackKid

customer_reviews.title: Right product at right price
customer_reviews.text: It's odd that something so simple could impress so much. Metal is of sufficient gauge to withstand heel pressure from use. Hooked end is more practical in use than comparable models with soft loops. All edges rounded for smooth insertion. Length very good for my western work boots.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Schley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both boots and shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my own use but my husband "stole" it from me to use while putting on his Red Wing work boots. So, I bought two more - one for myself and for my children. I bought it to use with my winter boots but have found it equally helpful for shoes. Would absolutely recommend this product, particularly this sturdy metal version.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe horn - heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why we should rate this on its travel appropriateness. It's a solid metal shoe horn... Great for home. Super sturdy and very useful. Exactly what I was looking for but would not recommend traveling with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: High quality, life time investment
customer_reviews.text: All expectations met or exceeded. This shoe horn arrived with perfect finish, no scratches, nicks, burs anywhere. Product is well made with quality material and sturdy enough to last for a long time. It is wide enough at the blade, all shoes slip on easily with no deformation of the shoe. The extra reach makes it easy and convenient to use while standing. I would definitely buy this again but I suspect I will never have to.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Long length. Strong and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love long length, it's stronger than expected, no chance it will bend in use, smooth and easy to use. Makes getting shoes on easily without causing damage to heel of my shoes. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Casey

customer_reviews.title: Plenty long and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn could deter a burglar in the middle of the night! It’s that 💪 strong❗️My only negative would be that on tight fitting shoes, the curve, where my heel rests, is not concave enough to accommodate the snug-wiggle-in process. Other than that, this is primo.
customer_reviews.author: linda galella

customer_reviews.title: Ordering more!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shoehorn so much I am ordering 5 more for him to give to his friends and our son-in-law! We bought this originally because he had surgery and the doctor didn't want him to bend down below 45 degrees. He couldn't believe he didn't get one when he was a lot younger!
customer_reviews.author: VSE

customer_reviews.title: This is a heavy duty stainless steel product that allows me to slip into my shoes very easily. It is built to last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: If you need the assistance of a shoe horn putting on your shoes as I do then this is the Shoe Horn for you. I had a plastic product but it was too limber and didn't hold up. This is a heavy duty stainless steel product that allows me to slip into my shoes very easily. It is built to last a lifetime, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bugg

customer_reviews.title: Will last several lifetimes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously heavy duty shoe horn with a perfect length, that will likely last indefinitely. I have but one criticism, and that would be that the edges are quite sharp. This is easily remedied with a file, to just break the edges a bit, to prevent damage to soft leather. If not for that small detail, this would be 5 stars plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for cleats.  Loved it so much, had to buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons, especially to help them get on their football cleats. It replaced another really good, sturdy (but short) shoehorn that they somehow managed to bend and ruin. I thought we'd try the longer one to see if it was easier to use. Anyway, I know they liked because it kept disappearing into one or other of their sports bags. It is super strong and really is easier to use than the smaller style. I had to buy a second one for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lee Fox

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a pair of tall boots that don’t have zippers and I’d noticed the heel was starting to show damage from just shoving my foot in so I thought a shoe horn might prevent further damage. It’s a lifesaver for those boots and I’ve started using it for other shoes as well. The shoe horn is sturdy, I love the length, and I think it’s going to keep several pairs of shoes in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Near-perfect; just order the right length for you
customer_reviews.text: My tall guys like a sturdy shoe horn. I looked around for years until I realized you can only find such things online. I don't think it'll ever wear out. Very well made and nicely curved to fit the heel. They deemed it a bit short, though, but didn't want to send it back, so it is hanging next to the shoes together with a longer version. It's just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST.SHOEHORN.EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: It may seem weird to get excited about a SHOEHORN, but I AM!! This is one heavy, SOLID piece of metal! The edges are smooth and rounded, and it's highly polished. (You COULD use it as a weapon - it's THAT solid. I doubt it would even dent.) And of course, it helps you get your shoes on. I HIGHLY recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Scully

customer_reviews.title: This is a super strong shoe horn!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn is very strong and long enough for taller boots. I gave it only 4 stars because it is a bit thick and doesn't fit against the back of the shoe tightly.
customer_reviews.author: janet culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall slip on style boots
customer_reviews.text: This tool not only makes it easier to put on my tall slip on boots, but it saves wear and tear on the lining as well since there is reduced friction and less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Deliberate Evaluation

customer_reviews.title: It is simple, nicely finished with no sharp edges, functional, and exceptionally sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a temporary solution to putting on my own shoes after surgery. Unfortunately, everyone has grown accustomed to receiving cheaply made products that may serve the purpose initially, but do not last. So, just wanting a short term solution, I did a cursory search of shoes horns and kept coming back to this detailed description coupled with positive reviews and hoped for the best. I was pleasantly rewarded! Not only does it fit my immediate needs, but I’m certain it will last and continued to be used daily. It is simple, nicely finished with no sharp edges, functional, and exceptionally sturdy. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Long, thick, smooth, great for keeping shoes nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, thick, long shoehorn. I got it in favor of some others, as many others with thinner metal reported bending issues, which I remember from shoehorns growing up. It's a great horn. My only issue is that the edges are dulled, but not rounded, so it's a little abrasive on socks and shoes still. It's not enough to cause any issues, I think, since it's not sharp. It's just not rounded like some of the higher end shoehorns I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Moseley

customer_reviews.title: SHoehorn makes shoes fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no more struggling with boots or getting dizzy bending over for long periods of time trying to get those bulky socks into them. Life is more fun!
customer_reviews.author: C. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Super thick steel that will probably outlast most tire irons
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the BOMB! Super thick steel that will probably outlast most tire irons. Totally unexpected to be honest and it is the perfect length to use standing to out on shoes while still maintaining dexterity for positioning inside your shoe. Wide enough that there are no snags on foot entry either. Really really good shoe horn!
customer_reviews.author: Raven99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the construction. I've needed a long shoehorn for some time now and finally went ahead to get it. Delivery was on time as promised. It absolutely meets my needs so I don't have to bend over so far to get my shoes on. Aging makes bending down more difficult and this well-made shoe horn solves most of that problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Foot slides right in.
customer_reviews.text: Would have like the bottom to be a tad bit wider but other than that it is a great product. Long enough that you can use it on tall boots but not so long that it gets in the way of regular shoes. The horn is very solid and as long as you don't lose it, will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: readmore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe horn. It's sturdy and long, don't have to bend over. I put a zip tie thru the hole and hung it on the side of my shoe rack. Can't live without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Savy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn is great in quality. It is heavy duty and definitely feels like it will not break. I am handicapped and it helps me get my shoes on without flattening the back. Can use the hook at end to pick shoes up or other clothing items when dropped. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bish

customer_reviews.title: Shoe horn is too thick and rigid
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy, but too sturdy for the application in my opinion. The thick steel (I haven't put a micrometer to it yet, but it appears to be a hair over 1/16" thick when held to my tape measure) makes it painful to put on my snug dress boots.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin A Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and right sized to make things so much easier to get my shoes on. It’s helpful to reach things under the bed and in high cupboards too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marrapodi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and arrived quickly. I thought it might be a little longer but is long enough. After hip and knee replacement and lumbar fusion, Using these longer shoe horns is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: High quality with one small downside.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My only complaint is that the edges aren’t as smooth as I’d like and using it everyday might wear the top of my boots prematurely. This thing is built so well that my kids might be inheriting this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Orpen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made and easy to use. After reading reviews for other shoe horns I choose this one and I am glad. It is a prefect length for me and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug97031

customer_reviews.title: This sturdy shoe horn allows you to put on your shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy shoe horn allows you to put on your shoes with ease and without a lot of bending. The horn will not bend or break under the amount of pressure applied by a person. Bought for others as well as myself. The reorder had a longer handle but will work well for some that can't stoop too well.
customer_reviews.author: jaylyn

customer_reviews.title: One serious shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a shoehorn before. I bought it to get on tall boots. I have high arches that make it difficult. This shoehorn took care of the problem. Boots slide right on with ease. This shoehorn will outlast me. It's made of thick metal. You couldn't break this if you wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyessster

customer_reviews.title: Quality costs more, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn may cost more, but it is very well made. Thick enough that it feels like it will last forever, but thin enough to fit. Makes putting on my dress shoes a LOT easier. I've got a bad knee, and this thing makes putting on my shoe a lot easier. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rykymus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Simple but just what I was looking for. Nice heavy stainless steel so it won't break like the plastic one I had before. Heavy enough that it won't brbd either. Thin enough to easily fit in the shoe behind your heel.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: My tall husband 6'1" loves this as do I 5'4". It's a great sturdy shoe horn as compared to plastic ones in the past that eventually break. The length is fine for both of us. If you are looking for a quality Shoe Horn this is it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pooh Bear's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for a fat man with back issues that can't reach his heals anymore. It is of sturdy construction and expect it to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy shoe horn and relatively inexpensive. We have been using this everyday and have no complaints whatsoever. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: ena

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality very sturdy long shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality very sturdy long shoe horn. I wear Rocky lined waterproof boots. I find that the friction between my sock and boot tends to pull the sock out of place and eventually tear the lining of the boot. I use this to get my boots on without it pulling the heal of my socks up or tearing up the heal of the boot lining. This is sturdy enough, I can't imagine it breaking ever. So buy one and you should be set for a lifetime of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Brashier

customer_reviews.title: Titanium quality, will last a life time
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiest shoe horn on earth, There is no way you could chip, break, or snap this shoe horn. If you buy this shoe horn, it will last you a lifetime and the length is great for elderly people.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first shoe horn I ever had and it is a really good one. It is long enough to put my shoe on without having to bend all the way down. I'm about 5'8" and I only had to bend my knees just ever so slightly for the shoe horn to reach down. The material is a really sturdy so there are no worries about it breaking or bending it.
customer_reviews.author: Hero Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I cannot imagine a better shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: I cannot imagine a better shoe horn. The metal is thick and strong, yet the shoehorn is half as thick as the plastic shoehorn it replaces. Short of a sledgehammer, nothing is going to damage this shoehorn. Yet it is comfortable and highly effective in its role. Truly a masterpiece. Note to Jon: Please do not jack up the price. You'll make better money on volume.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must for those of us who don't bend so well anymore! Sturdy, easy to use. Fast delivery. What else is there
customer_reviews.author: rrranch

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who has arthritis and sometimes finds it hard to put on his shoes. He loves it - much more durable than the plastic one he had, which broke. It's long enough to use while standing up.
customer_reviews.author: beanie and fiona

customer_reviews.title: Simple and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly helpful ! Sturdy and rust proof , you can keep one handy wherever you change and stop ruining your joints , back and shoes by walking with your heel sticking out ! A great gift idea - I’m getting a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: this shoehorn I will give to my wife it is a little too narrow for me this should be labled for woman who have a smaller foot thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James Dziadkowsky

customer_reviews.title: I'm old, tall, and have arthritis but my shoes are on :)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for the money. I research ed a ton of different ones and this works great for a long reach and big feet :) No way will this thing bend or not work as intended. Adding a small strap like a shoelace through the top hole makes it easier to hang on something.
customer_reviews.author: User Friendly

customer_reviews.title: Shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shoe horn. The best! Long enough, strong enough, and easy to use. I will order for family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy duty, long shoe horn... it works good and helps prevent me from grinding my foot into the heal of my shoe.. the length is to make it easier for not needing to bend all the way over, but it also works good for a pair of boots I have.
customer_reviews.author: eDeal

customer_reviews.title: You will never have to buy another!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! He has had plastic ones in the past that brake, this one will not! I even use it, had major surgery on my back, makes it easy to put my walking shoes on! Let's just say I will never have to buy another shoehorn for the rest of my days!
customer_reviews.author: Arrow

customer_reviews.title: Great. Long enough to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Great. Long enough to do the job. And build from thick stainless steal, this will never bend or wear out under standard uses. If I ever have to go to the Amazon rainforest I could take this as a machete! Nice job!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy shoe horn that should last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife after the plastic one she had been using split. It is well made and robust. At first I was concerned it might be too robust, as it is a bit thicker at the business end than the plastic one was. But, my wife says "no problem" and loves it. That rates "5 stars" in my book...
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty shoe horn. Just long enough to fit into my shoes without having to bend over. Much easier on my old hip joint.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Woodinville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. They help me get my shoes on every morning. Strong, sturdy and long enough that I am not straining to put my shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: G. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this long handled metal shoe horn. It is sturdy and well designed. He loves the fact that he can put on his shoes standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Brosnahan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoehorn.
customer_reviews.text: I have boots that are difficult to put on. This shoehorn solves that problem. I had been using a plastic one, but after that broke before I got my second boot on, I decided the metal one was a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: BookaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: “Where’s the beef?”  Beef has arrived!
customer_reviews.text: I received an empty package. ??? Product must have poked hole in the soft bag package. Waiting for replacement. Giving a 3 while waiting for action. UPDATE: Replacement received promptly, and is a solid, heavy duty horn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Horn that works and won't break
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and will last my life time for sure. Helps me get my shoes on with my inserts in. I also don't have to lean over very much anymore to get my shoes on. It will never break like the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: blarneygal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day. I am a man with a larger frame and sometimes struggle with shoes that have soft heel cups. They fold over into the shoe very easily. This solves the problem. Perfect length. Great fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoehorn Ever
customer_reviews.text: This shoehorn is made of extra strong, thick stainless steel and will not bend or break. Its extra length permits you to put on your shoes without bending if you have a back problem. This is the best-made, highest quality shoehorn I've ever had, and I am a senior citizen!
customer_reviews.author: podmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shoe horn for my elderly father. At 99 years old he is difficult to find a gift for, but he asked if I had a shoe horn. I didn't, so went on line to find one. I chose the 18" stainless shoe horn since it looked sturdy. Also, he has balance problems and I figured he would not have to bend over to use it. Must have been right because he said the shoe horn was great.
customer_reviews.author: rsparkie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The wooden one my father-in-law used for years had broken, so we ordered this one. It is perfect and will not break!
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk Fan

product_meta.title: Comfy Clothiers 18-Inch Long Handled Stainless Steel Shoe Horn
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :16.5 x 0.6 x 0.3 inches; 7.04 Ounces
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :February 21, 2016
 * ASIN :B01C3BYJM8

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #28,939 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #18 inShoe Horns & Boot Jacks 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars1,897 ratings
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY DESIGN: Our long shoe horn is thicker than other metal shoe horns on the market (200 grams vs. 120 gram average), so it won’t bend, break or let you down when you need it most, such as after Back Surgery, Knee Surgery or a Hip Replacement procedure

EASY ON YOUR BACK: The long length of our long metal shoe horn allows you to put on and take off your favorite shoes without excessive bending, helping to prevent pulled muscles or aggravation to an existing condition such as Arthritis, Sciatica or just general aches and pains

STAINLESS STEEL QUALITY: These shoehorns have a smooth “brushed” finish and are made of 100% stainless steel making this an attractive long handled shoehorn for boots (aka shoe spoon) to hang in your home or office using the convenient eye hole feature

SHOE HORN SPECS: Please note, our long handle shoe horn is made from an 18-inch piece of 100% stainless steel and then has a curved handle, making the actual usable length approximately 16.5", as with most other "18-inch" shoe horns you see on the market

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you are not completely satisfied with this extra long shoe horn with long handle, just contact us after purchase and we will issue you a full refund including return shipping costs
